Starship is:
Fast: it's fast – really really fast! Customizable: configure every aspect of your prompt. Universal: works on any shell, on any operating system. Intelligent: shows relevant information at a glance. Feature rich: support for all your favorite tools. Easy: quick to install – start using it in minutes.
